portrayals.role_description: A visceral and tragic portrayal focusing on the extreme physical suffering and sacrifice of the crucifixion.
A reluctant governor who is physically and politically distressed by the trial, seeking multiple ways to release Jesus.
portrayals.conflict_notes: Much more sympathetic and troubled than the satirical version in Life of Brian or the pragmatic version in Ben-Hur.

portrayals.role_description: A devoted follower portrayed with deep maternal and spiritual grief.
